FldSvcObjChgDtl.name: FldSvcObjChgDtl
FldSvcObjChgDtl.description: Represents the details of a change made to one of a service appointmentâ€™s tracked fields.

FieldChangedName.description: The API name of the field that was changed.

FieldChangedValue.description: The updated value of the field that was changed.

FldSvcObjChgId.description: The parent record associated with the details of the change. The parent record has multiple detail records associated with it. Each record includes the name and the current value of the tracked fields.
